Verses: 1 isravel Vamsaththaare, Ungalaikkuriththu Naan Pulambi Sollum Indha Vasanaththaik Kelungal.
2 isravel Ennum Kannigai Vizhundhaal, Aval Ini Orupodhum Ezhundhirukkamaattaal; Than Dhesaththil Vizhundhukidakkiraal, Avalai Eduppaarillai.
3 nagaraththilirundhu Purappatta Aayiramperil Nooruperum, Nooruperil Paththupperum Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Meendhiruppaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Dhevan Sollugiraar.
4 karththar Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ennaith Thedungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaippeergal.
5 beththelaith Thedaadheyungal, Kilkaalilum Seraadheyungal, Peyersebaavukkum Pogaadheyungal; Enendraal: Kilkaal Siraiyiruppaagavum, Beththel Paazhaana Sthalamaagavum Pogum.
6 karththaraith Thedungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaippeergal; Illaavittaal Beththelil Irukkira Oruvaraalum Arivikkappadaadha Akkini Yoseppin Veettil Patri Adhaip Patchikkum.
7 nyaayaththai Ettiyaaga Maatri, Needhiyaith Tharaiyile Vizhappannugiravargale, Avaraith Thedungal.

8 avar Arumeenaiyum Mirugaseerishaththaiyum Undaakkinavar; Avar Marana Irulai Vidiyarkaalamaaga Maatri, Pagalai Raaththiriyaaga Andhagaarappaduththugiravar; Avar Samuththiraththin Thanneergalai Varavazhaiththu, Avaigalai Boomiyin Visaalaththinmel Ootrugiravar; Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.
9 aranaana Sthalaththinmel Paazhkkadippu Varaththakkadhaaga, Avar Kollai Koduththavanai Balaththavanukku Virodhamaai Laguvadaiyappannugiravar.
10 olimugavaasalile Kadindhukollugiravanai Avargal Pagaiththu, Yadhaarththamaaip Pesugiravanai Verukkiraargal.

11 neengal Dhariththiranai Midhiththu, Avan Kaiyile Dhaaniyaththai Sumai Sumaiyaai Vaangugirapadiyinaal, Neengal Polindha Karkalaal Veedugalaikkattineergala, Aanaalum Avaigalil Neengal Kudiyiruppadhillai; Inbamaana Dhraatchaththottangalai Naattineergal, Aanaalum Avaigalin Rasaththai Neengal Kudippadhillai.
12 ungal Meerudhalgal Migudhiyendrum, Ungal Paavangal Balaththadhendrum Ariven; Needhimaanai Odukki, Paridhaanam Vaangi, Olimugavaasalil Ezhaigalin Nyaayaththaip Purattugireergal.
13 aagaiyaal Buththimaan Andhak Kaalaththile Mownamaayirukkavendum; Andhak Kaalam Theemaiyaana Kaalam.
14 neengal Pizhaikkumpadikkuth Theemaiyai Alla, Nanmaiyaith Thedungal; Appozhudhu Neengal Sollugirapadiye Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalode Iruppaar.
15 neengal Theemaiyai Veruththu, Nanmaiyai Virumbi, Olimugavaasalil Nyaayaththai Nilaippaduththungal; Oruvelai Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaryoseppile Meedhiyaanavargalukku Iranguvaar.

16 aadhalaal Aandavarum Senaigalin Dhevanumaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ellaaththerukkalilum Pulambal Undaagum; Ellaa Veedhigalilum Aiyo! Aiyo! Endru Olamiduvaargal; Payiridugiravargalai Dhukkankondaadugiradharkum, Oppaari Paada Arindhavargalaip Pulambugiradharkum Varavazhaippaargal.
17 ellaa Dhraatchaththottangalilum Pulambal Undaayirukkum, Naan Un Naduve Kadandhupoven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
18 karththarudaiya Naalai Virumbugiravargalukku Aiyo! Adhinaal Ungalukku Enna Undu? Karththarudaiya Naal Velichchamaayiraamal Andhagaaramaayirukkum.
19 singaththukkuth Thappinavanukkuk Karadi Edhirppattadhupolavum, Alladhu Veettukkulle Vandhu Suvarinmel Than Kaiyai Vaiththapodhu Paambu Avanaik Kadiththadhupolavum Irukkum.
20 karththarudaiya Naal Velichchamaayiraamal, Irulum Pragaasamatra Andhagaaramumaayirukkumallavo?
21 ungal Pandigaigalaip Pagaiththuverukkiren; Ungal Aasarippunaatkalil Enakkup Piriyamillai.
22 ungal Thaganapaligalaiyum Pojanapaligalaiyum Enakkup Padaiththaalum Naan Angeegarikkamaatten; Kozhumaiyaana Ungal Mirugangalin Sthoththirapaligalaiyum Naan Nokkip Paarkkamaatten.
23 un Paattugalin Iraichchalai Ennaivittu Agatru; Un Veenaigalin Osaiyai Naan Ketkamaatten.
24 nyaayam Thanneeraippolavum, Needhi Vatraadha Nadhiyaippolavum Puranduvarakkadavadhu.
25 isravel Vamsaththaare, Neengal Vanaandharaththile Irundha Naarpadhu Varushamvaraiyil Paligalaiyum Kaanikkaigalaiyum Enakku Seluththineergalo?
26 neengal Ungalukku Undaakkina Molegudaiya Koodaaraththaiyum, Ungal Dhevargalin Natchaththira Raasiyaagiya Ungal Soroobangalin Sapparaththaiyum Sumandhukonduvandheergale.
27 aagaiyaal Ungalaith Thamaskuvukku Appaale Kudiyottuven Endru Senaigaludaiya Dhevan Ennum Naamamulla Karththar Sollugiraar.
